Snatching Winds.name: Snatching Winds
Snatching Winds.flavor: Your spirit companion turns into a whirlwind, battering your enemies and lifting them into the air.
Snatching Winds.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, your allies can move through the target’s space, and the target can’t use opportunity actions.

Hurricane's Fury.name: Hurricane's Fury
Hurricane's Fury.flavor: You call on the fury of Stormhawk, summoning storm winds that push your allies about the battlefield and scatter your enemies like rag dolls.
Hurricane's Fury.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. The target is dazed (save ends).
Hurricane's Fury.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square. The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Hurricane's Fury.effect: You slide each ally in the blast 3 squares.

Shielding Winds.name: Shielding Winds
Shielding Winds.flavor: Wind spirits push your ally out of danger.
Shielding Winds.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when any enemy ends its movement adjacent to the target, you can slide the target 1 square as a free action.
